step.title: Setup Steps
step.text: This set of steps will do some preliminary "safety" checks to ensure the local environment is ok and setup some important information.

step.title: Pick a Version Number
step.text: Please enter the version number to publish.

step.title: Enter your CPAN email address
step.text: This is needed to support automatic PAUSE uploading

step.title: Enter your CPAN account name
step.text: This is needed to support automatic PAUSE uploading

step.title: Enter your Source Forge account name
step.text: This is needed to support automatic SF uploading

step.title: running svn update
step.text: This ensures the local checkout is up to date

step.title: Check for changes
step.text: This steps looks for outstanding files that have been modified. There should be no outstanding modifications! If this step finds outstanding modified files you need to check them in or revert them before continuing!

step.title: Source Code Setup
step.text: This set of steps will modify various places within the source code tree to bring it up to date with the new version number about to be published.

step.title: make distclean on the current directory
step.text:
We need to update the local version number and thus the current Makefile needs to be regenerated after we update the version number, so we nuke everything from orbit first here.
Note: this may fail if there is no current Makefile; continue if it fails.

step.title: Modifying sources for the new version
step.text: Modifying the sources to update to version {VERSION}

step.title: Commit the changes
step.text: Only continue if the above changes look ok

step.title: Make Test
step.text: Perform a make test to make sure everything works.

step.title: Create Release
step.text:
We'll now: - create the SVN tag - export the results to a tar ball. - upload it to CPAN
Quit now if you're not ready to finish the release.

step.title: rsync the new files
step.text: This will copy the results to the SF uploads directory in your account on frs.sourceforge.net

step.title: Update the SF release web page
